# is

  is is a type checking component, forked from manuelstofer/is

## Installation

Browserify/NPM

```sh
    $ npm install --save gm-is
```

```js
  var is = require('gm-is');
```

Component

```sh
    $ component install green-mesa/is
```

```js
  var is = require('is');
```
## API

- is.array
- is.arguments
- is.function
- is.string
- is.number
- is.date
- is.regexp
- is.object

based on the underscore.js type checking functions
